alert.note: Alert for Christian (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 05 at 8:33PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 AM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Missouri, including the following county, Christian. * WHEN...Until 830 AM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Dangerous flows over low-water crossings. Some low-water crossings may become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 830 PM CDT, gauge reports indicated ongoing flooding along Wilsons Creek in western Springfield. This flood wave will continue downstream along Wilsons Creek causing impassable conditions overnight at Old Limey Road in the Christian County Panhandle. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Wilsons Creek at Old Limey Road. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
